Radio Show: January 24, 2021

29 Jan 2021

No Gall . No Glory Missed a week due to robot issues at the transmitter. Just finished watching The Crown and the first bit is all songs about Thatcher. Then we go into a lot of internation hardcore and d-beat.

  1. How Does It Feel? / Crass
  2. Ghost Town / The Specials
  3. Between The Wars / Billy Bragg
  4. Thatcher’s Fortress / The Varukers
  5. No Government / Anti-Pasti
  6. Thatchercide / Doom
  7. Let’s Start A War (Said Maggie One Day) / The Exploited

  10. Still Fighting Thatcher / Hard Skin
  11. alerta antifascista / Sin Dios
  12. Energy / Grimple
